choices: give another pair of hypnotic flip flops to someone else
1.content:
Jessica was on her usual late night walk, she was silently walking through the streets of the city with a look of absolute boredom. Jessica was tired of her everyday life and desired a drastic change in her life, she had often read story of far of lands and magical creatures and often desired to join them, at one point she even considered taking a year off to travel the globe but due to her shy and un-ambitious nature she never acted upon these desires and simply stayed at home reading more fantasy. even her intense fetish was kept to her self, Jessica was frustrated at her own inability to act upon her desires and as usual she resolved to change herself but was imprisoned by her own personality and could not act without a good push.

as she walked through the streets her own mental silence was broken when she noticed a old beggar woman in a long trench stumble into the road unconscious, Jessica was shocked at this random turn of events and was stood their in a surprised silence unable to move, seconds later she noticed a careless driver speeding towards the unconscious woman and quickly scanned the area hoping to notice a passing hero, with no sign of a miracle rescue Jessica act with out thinking. as the car drew closer to the beggar woman Jessica rushed to her rescue, seconds before the streets were paved with the woman's blood Jessica grabbed her arm and with a strength like a mother saving their child pulled the old woman out of the streets.

the beggar lady regained consciousness soon after and had immediately realized what had happened and with a dry cold breath she said to Jessica "you *cough* you-you saved my life, how *cough* how *cough* how can I ever *cough* repay you?", Jessica feeling uneasy about the whole situation desired more than anything to get home "it was noth-" the beggar lady immediately knew what Jessica was going to say and interrupted her "it was not *cough* not nothing, i may *cough* not *cough**cough have much *cough* time left but *cough* you still *cough* saved me *cough**cough**cough*" the beggar lady mustered all her strength and stood up, she reached into her coat and pulled out a small jewellery box and handed it to Jessica "take this *cough*, it's my most *cough* prized possession, use *cough* it wise-*cough*ly" before Jessica could get a word in edgeways the woman slipped of into night.

Jessica's curiosity got the better of her she carefully opened the reveal it's contents, to her surprise it appear the be a 3 fingered severed monkeys hand, Jessica immediately understood what it was having read the story of "The monkeys paw" which granted a person 3 wishes but they came at a price as do most story's of magically obtaining wishes. being both curios and hopeful Jessica decided to make a wish, being some one who had often thought of this concept she had long decided what her first wish would be "I wish that my next wishes would go exactly as I want them to and that I would suffer no consequences from them or any of my future actions", Jessica stood staring at the monkeys paw expectingly for in the story the monkeys finger would close upon granting her wish.

Jessica stood for a moment but nothing happened "I should have known it wouldn't- " as she was speaking the monkeys finger close and Jessica jumped back in surprise, her wish came true and now she would be safe to make 2 more wishes, Jessica knew what her second wish would be "I wish that I would be more confident" the monkeys finger closed faster than it did the first time, she instantly felt the effects of the wish just made and it caused her to widely smirk and her third wish had flowed forth from her mouth "I wish that I was omnipotent" the monkeys finger closed causing Jessica to burst into laughter "ha ha ha-ha hahahahahahahahahaha!!!". she dropped the monkeys paw and walked away gleefully.

Jessica had decided to walk all the way to her best friend Kate's house, she knocked on the door and Kate immediately answers "oh Jessica what are you doing here?" Kate was 18 being born a few months earlier to Jessica, she was a slender brunette with long hair, she was 5 ft 6 and had green eyes, she was wearing a light blue t-shirt a black mini-skirt and on her feet were black flats. Jessica smiled "can I come in for a moment" Kate feeling no animosity towards Jessica complied, they entered Kate's living room "what is it Jessica?" Jessica replied "could you do me a favour?" Jessica lifted up her hands showing that she was holding a pair of pale blue flip flops with black straps "could you try these on?". Kate was shocked at Jessica's request, Kate had the opposite opinion towards feet than Jessica and had never worn a pair of flip flops in her life, Kate knew, that Jessica knew this, although Kate was unaware of Jessica's fetish.

Kate answered Jessica's request "why on earth would I do that?", Jessica anticipated Kate's answer and said "if you do I'll buy you a chocolate bar" Kate was a avid fan of chocolate and would do most things with in reason for some, Kate contemplated Jessica's request "I'm not sure" Jessica pleaded "come on, I'll even put them on your feet for you", Kate was surprised at Jessica's desperation but reluctantly agreed "all right fine let's just get this over with" Kate sat down on her sofa while Jessica got her knees at Kate's feet, she lifted Kate's right leg in the air and slid her black flat of off her foot, Kate's feet were things of beauty, as soon as her foot hit fresh air, it's smell instantly reached Jessica's nose, the odour brought utter joy to Jessica although she kept this hidden from Kate, she repeated this action with Kate's left foot which doubled her pleasure

Jessica had trouble hiding her pleasure from Kate so she tried to distract her instead "you know Kate" Kate's interest arose Jessica lifted Kate's right leg and began to slowly slide the flip flop on to her foot "these are very special flip flops" as soon as the toe post slid in between her toes Kate felt ill "I don't feel so..." Jessica put Kate's right foot down and continued talking "I made them myself" Kate was suprised at the usually clumsy Jessica but was helpless as Jessica raised her left leg "Jessica i think we should sto-..." Jessica interrupted Kate as she started to slowly slide the left flip flop on "I made them just for you :)" as soon as the toe post slid in between her toes Kate stiffened up, her eyes went blank and seemed no more than a shell.

Jessica smiled at her reaction and put her leg down "Kate?" Kate's feet came to attention "these are 'hypnotic flip flops', don't you just love them?" Kate wiggled her toes "yes master", Jessica stood up "as soon you put them on you obey my every command, isn't that great" Kate wiggled her toes "yes master", Jessica was overjoyed at the situation "oh and you wiggle your toes when you speak, stand" kate wiggled her toes "yes master" Kate stood up "the effects of the flip flops work even when your not wearing them, but i love a girl in flip flops, so Kate what do you think of your knew flip flops? kate wiggled her toes "I hate flip flops, master" Jessica perked up even more "well from now on you love flip flops and obeying me" kate wiggled her toes "yes master", Jessica had a idea "now go back to being who you were but don't forgot what i told" kate wiggled her toes "yes master" she loosened up

Jessica was deciding what to do next now that she was all powerful "now what should we do?"

choices: Somebody walks in on the scene
131.content:
Hypnotism she could reluctantly see as possible, but turning into flip-flops? That was pretty hard to swallow. Kate was sick of this, she turned and started walking away, she wiggled her toes "Look Jess, I don't know what you're playing at b-" Jess gestured Kate to stop, and she found herself unable to take another step. "Oh, Kate, give it a chance! Just kneel here for a second" Jess put her feet up on a stool and slid her flip-flops off.

Kate couldn't stop her self from kneeling at the stool. But a part of her truly wanted to obey. Jess ordered her to stare at her large, soft feet. "I've had a long day, and they may be a little smelly. You'll be surprised how many people enjoy that! So really stare at them." Kate obeyed, hating the sight if the grime in her toes, the little bit of grit on the balls of her feet, the long soles, soft heels, cute little toes....what's happening to me? Kate thought to herself. She shook her head and averted her gaze, more defiant than ever.

Jess laughed and put her flip-flops back on. "See?" She boasted. Kate stuttered and composed herself. "No! I'll never give in!" Jess took a moment to think. "That's cute. I'll tell you what, you'll be my lovely comfy flip-flops, but I'll let you control my legs and where we go, just to ease you into your new life."
131.title: Kate controls jessica

1311.content:
Kate was done with this. She ran out of the room before Jess could order her to stop. Kate raced down the apartment stairs, nudging people out of the way. She heard Jess shout "hey!" from the room, but that became overshadowed the "flipflopflipflopflipflopflip" of her rushing down the halls and into the street. "That was...wow." Kate thought to herself. "What a freak! I'm staying clear away from Jess now on." Then a thought entered her head. She was still wearing the flip-flops. She was about to slide them off but...

"Stop Kate!"

It was Jess, she yelled from a window. Kate froze.

"Ha! Now crawl back up here!"

A few people had heard this, and watched Kate crawl back up to Jess. Who waited with a wide grin. "Oh Kate. You won't run anymore. It's time!" Jess shook her hands with glee and Kate sunk into her flip-flops, turning them bright pink. Jess slipped a foot into the toe post, wiggling to secure it. Kate groaned in disgust, she could smell and taste the foot at the same time. Jess put the other foot on and applied her full pressure onto Kate. Kate felt a little light-headed as she was squeezed under the soles. "Now take me somewhere nice! And don't worry, every step will make you love my feet just a little bit more. They're kind of hypnotic." Jess giggled. Kate had a plan, taking Jess to the gym would distract her with all the feet there, while Kate would think of a way out of this. The only problem is the further the gym is, the more likely she'd fall in love with the disgusting feet that smothered her. Kate shuddered at the thought.

"Great, now let's finish our walk." Jessica said with a smile. Kate felt a warmth through her body, excited to be under Jessica's feet more, replying with, "Yes Mistress."

         "Ooo Mistress, I like that. Use that from now on." Jessica said as she continued her walk, now heading back to her place.

For Kate, the best part was all the sweat that she was able to taste and absorb, her body now being a pair of flip flops. The more sweat she swallowed, the more she was forgetting everything about her previous hatred for feet, the more her desire to worship Kate's did.

         The taste of Jessica's feet was so good to Kate, she now began to moan, causing Kate to smile as she came across her door. "Somebody loves my feet don't they?" Jessica teased, stroking the sole of her flip flop with her toes whilst she dug in her purse for her eyes. A wave of pleasure shot through Kate's body as her toes stroked her. If she nod she would. "Yes Mistress, I love your feet!" She said.

         Jessica unlocked her apartment and giggled and trotted to her bedroom and jumped on the bed. "Whew what a walk, breaking in a new pair of shoes definitely tires a girls feet. So Kate, do you feel broken in?" Jessica said, using her toes to play with her shoes, making the heel of the flip flops hit her heels softly.

         "Yes Mistress, I definitely feel broken in, I love being your footwear!" Kate said, accepting her position as Jessica's personal servant. Jessica smiled. "Oh really, awwweee you're so sweet."

         Kate felt another small wave of pleasure shudder through her at Jessica's words. In such a short time, she went from best friend, to submissive foot lover. Kate didn't care though anymore, all she wanted was to serve Jessica.

         Jessica smiled and got off the bed and went over to her closet. Jessica's closet was like any 19 year old's closet. A bunch of clothes everywhere, a small dresser for socks, panties, bra's etc.., and shoes everywhere. Jessica took her flip flops off and showed Kate her closet. "Welcome home! This is going to be your place when I need to leave you somewhere when your my footwear." Jessica said.

         Kate felt a wave of pleasure hit her and thanked Jessica. "Thank you so much Mistress, I love it." Jessica smiled and put her shoes back on the ground and rubbed her toes on each flip flop to give Kate a final good taste of her feet. Jessica put her flips flops in her closet, next to her ugg boots that she knew was covered in her foot sweat.

         "I'm gonna leave you in there for a little while pet, I want you to let you new position in life really sink in, I'll come back for you in a while." Jessica said, blowing a kiss to her. "I'll miss you Mistress." Kate said disappointed. Jessica felt a little bad, but she knew that this was necessary. Jessica rubbed her toes across Kate one last time and shut her closet door, leaving Kate alone, in the darkness, with nothing but the scent of Jessica's ugg boots.

Who do we follow?

Jessica was not yet content. She desired more slaves, and more she would have. As it is, Jessica would need the help of both her slaves. Back in high school, a goth girl named Lynn had bullied Jessica quite a bit. Now, she could have her revenge. Taking Grace to Kate, the trio of women got into Jessica's car and quickly arrived at Lynn's house. Jessica had never even seen Lynn's feet, as they were always encased in big, black leather boots. That would change today. Grace, Jessica and Kate got out of the car. They walked up the stairway to Lynn's house and knocked loudly.

Lynn opened the door. Before she could even say hello, Grace and Kate had each grabbed one of her arms and thrown her to the ground, while Jessica sat on her legs. "What the hell?" Lynn exclaimed at the sudden attack. "What's going on? Jessica, is that you? Cut it out!" Her screams were on vain. She struggled, but the grip of the three was too much for her. The most she could do was flex her wrists and shake her feet. Jessica slowly began to untie Lynn's big boots. She even wore them around the house, it seemed. "What are you doing to my boots, you freak? Screw off! I'm going to call the police." Jessica just laughed. With both boots untied, she gave each of them a tug, revealing a pair of flawless, pale, size nine feet. Black, glossy nail polish adorned her perfectly formed toes, and her high arch made Jessica's mouth water. She wondered which one of them was doing the hypnotizing as the pulled out the flip flops. "What are you doing, freak? Get away from my feet! Stop it! You fuc-" Her cries stopped abruptly as the flip flops were placed. Her eyes went glassy. Grace and Kate let go and stood up.

"I am your Master, understand?" Jessica demanded.
"Yes Master," came Lynn's blank reply.
"Good. Now, what to do with you..." Jessica examined Lynn's body. Her breasts were not overly large, but very well formed. Her long black hair with purple streaks framed her oval, pale face. She was quite attractive, and her feet were perfection personified. What does Jessica decide to do?

"All of you stay." She commanded, "Also stay facing the bed." Jessica left the room momentarily and slid something inside of the room, with a cover on it. She placed this item in the corner of her room and walked slowly around Lynn. As she walked behind her, she lifted her right leg, and gently rubbed her foot along Lynn's shoulder, then slowly rubbing her sole on Lynn's cheek, moving it where her sole was right in front of her lips.

         "Kiss." Lynn obeyed and kissed her sole, then doing the same with the other.

Lynn gulped and was a little embarrassed, for whatever reason, feeling shame in her actions. Unsure why she was feeling this way, she answered. "Yes Mistress." Lynn choked out. "And what happens to bad girls?" Jessica teased gently nibbling on her ear. Lynn, her face blushed bright red answered, "They get punished Mistress." Jessica pet her. "Good girl, now when I snap my finger, I want you to turn around and look at your punishment."

         Jessica stood up and went back to the item and pulled the cover off of it and snapped her finger.

         Lynn turned around and was shocked to see....
15412221.title: Firm Reminder

info.brief_description: Jessica acquires a power to live out her passion for flip flops and girls feet
info.description:
Jessica age 19 has always hated men but had a love of females, especially their feet and a distinct fetish for flip flops, but has never had the courage to act on her desires until one day she gains the power and courage to fulfil her foot filled desire

Jessica is a curvy blonde with long hair
she's 5 ft 9 an has blue eyes
she wears a bright pink t-shirt partially covered by a un-buttoned denim jacket
a short denim skirt and on her feet are white sock surrounded by pale pink flats

GROUND RULES

nothing too dark (e.g. rape, death) or disgusting (e.g. bestiality, scat)
no short chapters (at least 4 lines long)
